items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US markets gain, Asia trades flat
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates:

items.title: First Tick: Top 10 global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a muted start for the day.

items.title: Stock Radar: ONGC, Britannia, Hindalco, Bank of India, Sagility India, Awfis Space, NMDC, Blue Dart in focus on Tuesday
items.description: Stocks like Shree Cement, Ramco Cements, Insecticides India, Jubilant Foodworks, Hindustan Copper, National Fertilizers, HMA Agro Industries, HG Infra Engineering, Prataap Snacks, Blue Dart Express, and Triveni Turbine will also be in focus on November 12

items.title: Chart of the Day: The remarkable recovery in Power Grid’s capex
items.description: Total works in hand rose to Rs 1.43 lakh crore in November 2024 from Rs 50,500 crore in the year ago period.

items.title: Brokerage Radar: Shree Cement sees target cuts, Morgan Stanley ups ICICI Bank's price aim
items.description: Check out the latest brokerage calls and analyst comments on the stocks in action today. Our coverage includes Britannia Industries, Jubilant FoodWorks, Shree Cement and more.

items.title: MapmyIndia| One of companies to benefit from higher adoption of map-based services
items.description: The company is a leader in digital maps, geospatial software and location-based IoT (internet of things) products, offering full-stack, integrated solutions through its proprietary technology and expertise developed over 25 years.

items.title: Inox Wind share price in focus on repeat turnkey order for 87 MW
items.description: Inox Wind Share Price | Inox Wind will provide post commissioning multi-year operations & maintenance (O&M) services.

items.title: Live: Can Banks Provide The Much Needed Support To Nifty Bulls? ONGC, Hindalco In Focus|Opening Bell
items.description: Indian equity indices ended flat in a highly volatile session. At close, the Sensex was up just about 10 points or 0.01 percent at 79,496.15, and the Nifty was down 6.90 points or 0.03 percent at 24,141.30. On the back of mixed global cues, the Indian indices opened marginally lower but erased all the losses in the initial hour and extended the gain as the day progressed. But indices saw profit booking at higher levels and managed to end the day on a flat note. His morning global cues are mixed with Wall Sreet clocking record close as post election rally rages on. But the GIFT Nifty is signalling a muted start for the Indian market. Hindalco, Britannia, ONGC and Shree Cements will react to earnings while Natco Pharma and Samvardhana Motherson will report quarterly numbers today.  Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Nirav Chheda, Assistant Vice President-Equity Derivatives & Technical Research-Retail, Nirmal Bang and market expert Ambareesh Baliga.

items.title: Agri Picks Report November 12, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, Farmers in Telangana have sown rabi crops across 221,094 acres as of Wednesday, up 37.9% on year from 160,228 acres sown in the same period last year, according to a report released by the state's agriculture department.

items.title: UPL sees green shoots of recovery ahead; brokerages turn positive
items.description: UPL’s management reaffirmed its FY25 guidance, expecting 4–8 percent revenue growth and over 50 percent EBITDA growth, now that the liquidation of high-cost inventory is complete.

items.title: Buy Ashok Leyland; target of Rs 263: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on Ashok Leyland has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 263 in its research report dated November 11, 2024.

items.title: Nifty, Sensex snap three-day losing streak as realty counters rise; CPI data due later today
items.description: Nifty Realty was the brightest spark after it rose over 1 percent in the morning. Counters like DLF, Macrotek and Godrej Properties pulled the index higher.

items.title: Shree Cement stock slumps as Q2 net profit plunges 81% YoY; brokerages cut targets
items.description: Shree Cement recorded an 81% YoY slump in Q2FY25 standalone net profit at Rs 93 crore due to extended monsoon and softer pricing.

items.title: Aditya Birla Capital: Growth levers in place for this financial services player
items.description: Digital initiatives and group synergies will aid growth; merger of the NBFC arm could lift valuation

items.title: L&T Tech shares rise 3% on acquisition of California-based Intelliswift
items.description: This acquisition expands L&T Tech's access to major tech and retail clients, enabling it to enter adjacent markets like retail, fintech, and private equity.

items.title: Triveni Turbine flies 12% after solid Q2 earnings show
items.description: Triveni Turbine reported its highest ever revenue and EBITDA in Q2, led by a strong order book and a spike in exports.

items.title: Protean — Modest earnings in Q2, but huge headroom for growth
items.description: Stock valuation justified by dominant market position, unique business moats, and tailwinds from digital penetration

items.title: SAMHI Hotels: Expansion plans add to earnings visibility
items.description: Robust cash flow generation will ensure that SAMHI is able to largely fund the capex via internal accruals and without stretching the balance sheet

items.title: Max Healthcare stock soars 4% after firm completes acquisition of Jaypee Hospital
items.description: This acquisition grants Max Healthcare control of Jaypee's 500-bed Noida hospital, as well as two other hospitals in UP’s Bulandshahr and Anoopshahr.

items.title: NMDC shares slip 4% post Q2 earnings, JP Morgan sees over 6% downside
items.description: Year-to-date, NMDC's shares have gained over 6 percent but have trailed behind the Nifty 50, which has risen by 11 percent.

items.title: HG Infra Engineering shares tank 8% on weak Q2 show
items.description: At the operational level, EBITDA saw a slight dip, down 0.3 percent to Rs 219.5 crore from Rs 220.1 crore in Q2 FY24.

items.title: Hindalco stock rises as Q2 earnings beat estimates; brokerages divided on outlook
items.description: Hindalco's Q2FY25 earnings beat Street estimates. The company plans to invest between $4-5 billion over the next three years in a bid to grow the upstream side of business.

items.title: Rategain Travel stock plunges 10% after Kotak downgrade amid lofty valuations
items.description: Rategain delivered a solid Q2 with positive revenue growth and margin expansion, yet revised its FY25 revenue growth guidance down to 15 percent from the previous 20 percent amid persisting cyclical and structural headwinds.

items.title: SignatureGlobal shares climbs 5%; Kotak upgrades stock to 'Buy', raised target price
items.description: SignatureGlobal is on track to achieve its full-year guidance with new project launches planned for Gurgaon and Manesar in the second half of FY25.

items.title: Rs 275 crore: That's how much Swiggy paid merchant bankers for timely delivery of its IPO
items.description: After Paytm, this is the second-highest quantum of fee paid by a digital major making its entry in the public markets

items.title: Mid-day Mood | Nifty, Sensex erase gains, trade flat as auto, FMCG stocks dampen sentiment
items.description: Nifty Realty was the brightest spark, rising a massive 2 percent. A rally in DLF, Macrotek Developers, and Godrej Properties boosted sentiment in the sector.

items.title: RateGain Q2 FY25 – good quarter with indications of near-term softness
items.description: The company has lowered revenue guidance for the full year as order wins remain sluggish

items.title: Hero MotoCorp Q2 Preview: Volume uptick, rich mix may help net profit rise by 9%
items.description: Hero's total volumes for the quarter stood at 15.2 lakh units higher than the 14.1 lakh units sold in the same quarter of the previous fiscal year.

items.title: Uno Minda shares surge over 9% on strong Q2 earnings
items.description: Uno Minda is poised to commence operations at its four-wheeler lighting plant in Pune by Q3 FY25.

items.title: Big Money Moves: Are large caps poised to steal the spotlight from smallcaps?
items.description: Amid economic uncertainty, a wave of investor caution is reshaping the market, with capital flowing into large-cap stocks while small caps face a potential reality check on valuations and risks.

items.title: Live: Nifty Slides Below 24,000 As Opening Gains Reverse; Britannia, UPL In Focus| Closing Bell
items.description: Markets reverse early gains as profit-taking drags Nifty below 23,900, with broader markets also under pressure. Mid & small-cap stocks shed over a percent, and the market breadth remains dismal with an NSE Advance-Decline ratio of 1:3. Nifty Bank plunges over 700 points, slipping below 51,200, as almost all sectors turn red, led by declines in metals and auto. Join Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota for insights on the key stocks to watch.

items.title: Nifty slips, Sensex sheds 800 points as all sectors slide; India VIX up 3%
items.description: Mid- and small-cap indices followed the downward trend, sliding 1 percent and 1.3 percent, respectively.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Stocks that moved the most on November 12
items.description: Market sentiment has shifted to a cautious tone, driven by heavy outflows from foreign investors, stretched valuations, and subdued Q2 earnings across various sectors.
